attributes.action: Adopt stricter measures for Coronavirus outbreak. Stop putting lives at risk
attributes.additional_details: I feel this approach is serving financial interests and not the human right to health.
attributes.background: Adopt strategies to stop spread of coronavirus by applying strict measures like other countries have

rejection.details:
You may wish to sign this petition calling for the same action: https://petition.parliament.uk/petitions/301397

You can find out more about coronavirus and how you can protect yourself and others here:

NHS website: https://www.nhs.uk/conditions/coronavirus-covid-19/ 

UK Government website: https://www.gov.uk/guidance/coronavirus-covid-19-information-for-the-public
